data.name: Cartridge the Tiger
data.detailed_description:
Cartridge the Tiger is a pixel art platformer with a built-in level editor and C# SDK. I wanted to create something that exists somewhere between a game and a game engine, a toy box that can be enjoyed by casual players, kaizo players, level designers, people learning how to code, developers, and everyone in-between.

ğŸ¯ Features ğŸ¯


  • Run, jump, swim, fly, carry, throw, and roll around with a custom retro physics engine.
  • Designed for a controller.
  • Includes a story mode.
  • Built-in level editor.
  • Create your own levels.
  • Create your own stories.
  • Built on a custom game engine designed from the ground up for modding.
  • Includes an easy to use C# SDK, allowing anyone to create new objects for the level editor.
  • Each month I'll post new content made using this SDK, including the source code.
  • High framerate support.
  • Resizable window.

ğŸ¯ Editor Features ğŸ¯


  • Build on a map 20x bigger than Super Mario Maker.
  • Build with no arbitrary limits on the number of objects.
  • Select from over 200 objects, with over 25 enemies, or make your own.
  • Place slopes, water, and decoration anywhere you want.
  • Place signs with text to guide the player or tell a story.
  • Place objects on different Z layers.
  • Design complex puzzles using switches, wires, and logic blocks.
  • Create atmosphere with interactive lighting.
  • Control the camera with rooms.
  • Mix and match different background layers.
  • Add weather effects and post-processing.

ğŸ¯ Steam Workshop Features ğŸ¯


  • Subscribe to new objects, background, foregrounds, stories, and other mods.
  • Easily publish your own creations to the Steam Workshop.
  • Package mods with stories to provide players with an entirely new experience.

ğŸ¯ Online Features ğŸ¯


  • Upload levels and share them using a code.
  • Browsing uploaded levels will be added post-release if there's enough demand.
  • You do not need to create an account and the game does not require an internet connection.

data.short_description: Cartridge the Tiger is a pixel art platformer with a built-in level editor and C# SDK.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
